entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Québec
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:57 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Snow, -4.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Quebec Lesage Int'l Airport 05:50 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023
Condition: Snow
Temperature: -4.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.6 km
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -5.7°C
Wind: ENE 42 km/h gust 55 km/h
Air Quality Health Index:

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy or freezing rain. High zero.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to snow at times heavy this morning. Snowfall amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending before morning then cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Clearing early in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023
